title: NSkeletonProps
description: Props for the NSkeleton component. A placeholder loading indicator that mimics the shape of content while data is being fetched.

width.description: The width of the skeleton element (e.g., '100%', '200px')

height.description: The height of the skeleton element (e.g., '20px', '3rem')

rounded.description: Whether the skeleton has fully rounded corners (circle/pill shape)

className.description: Additional CSS class names for custom styling
